odase

Class ConcurrentKnowledgeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • odase.KnowledgeBase
      • odase.ConcurrentKnowledgeBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HedwigModel, Model, ModelReadOnly, ModelUpdate, SwrlModel, ValidatableModel

    public class ConcurrentKnowledgeBase
extends KnowledgeBase
    Concurrent ODASE implementation of the Model interface and provides access to a TBoxModel. This class is similar to KnowledgeBase except that it provides more concurrency at the cost of slightly slower sequential operations. If you wish to use concurrency then this is the Knowledge Base to use, if you do not need concurrency, then KnowledgeBase provides a slight performance benifit.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConcurrentKnowledgeBase

        public ConcurrentKnowledgeBase(KnowledgeBase kb)
        Create a copy of the given knowledge base. The new knowledge base and the existing one share some resources (such as database stores) but have their own copies of other resrouces (such as trie stores). Copying a KB with both a database and memory store will lead to inconsistencies. The memo table of the new store is initially the same as the existing store but the tables will begin to diverge, which is safe.

      • ConcurrentKnowledgeBase

        public ConcurrentKnowledgeBase(String MaybeCatalog,
                               String reasonerId,
                               List<String> storeIds,
                               String updateableStoreId,
                               KnowledgeBaseOptions options)
        Constructs the knowledge base with the given store ids. All the stores containing axioms must be passed here.
        Parameters:
        MaybeCatalog - the path to the catalog xml file (can be null)
        reasonerId - the uri of the reasoner (cannot be null, but if you don't know what to put, just put any valid uri)
        storeIds - the list of store uris
        updateableStoreId - the store in which the updates will be pushed (must be one from storeIds)
        doloresConfig - the configuration of dolores, to tune the performance/completeness compromise

      • ConcurrentKnowledgeBase

        public ConcurrentKnowledgeBase(String MaybeCatalog,
                               String reasonerId,
                               List<String> storeIds,
                               String updateableStoreId,
                               List<jmercury.kb_uri_spec.Rdf_data_store_getter_0> customStoreGetters,
                               KnowledgeBaseOptions options)
        Constructs the knowledge base with the given store ids. All the stores containing axioms must be passed here.
        Parameters:
        MaybeCatalog - the path to the catalog xml file (can be null)
        reasonerId - the uri of the reasoner (cannot be null, but if you don't know what to put, just put any valid uri)
        storeIds - the list of store uris
        updateableStoreId - the store in which the updates will be pushed (must be one from storeIds)
        customStoreGetters - the custom store getters, see odase.RdfDataStoreGetter
        doloresConfig - the configuration of dolores, to tune the performance/completeness compromise

    • Method Detail

      • overrideDataStoreFromStream

        public ConcurrentKnowledgeBase overrideDataStoreFromStream(String storeIdToOverride,
                                                           String mimeType,
                                                           InputStream stream)
        Description copied from class: KnowledgeBase
        Add a data store from the stream to parse in the syntax given by the mimeType. Warning, if the store contains tbox-axioms, they will not be taken into account as tbox (meaning any rules, concepts, properties will not be used in the reasoning).
        Overrides:
        overrideDataStoreFromStream in class KnowledgeBase
        Parameters:
        storeIdToOverride - the uri of the existing store to override with the rdf contained in the stream
        mimeType - can be application/rdf+xml for owl/rdf as xml, text/turtle for tutle (ttl), text/plain for ntriples (nt)
        stream - the stream containing rdf in the form of either rdf/xml, turtle or ntriples
        Returns:
        the new knowledge base, with the store overridden (this method does not modify the existing knowledge base)

      • overrideDataStoreWithEmptyMemoryStore

        public ConcurrentKnowledgeBase overrideDataStoreWithEmptyMemoryStore(String storeIdToOverride)
        Description copied from class: KnowledgeBase
        Create a new knowledge base with the store identified by storeIdToOverride reset to an empty memory rdf store
        Overrides:
        overrideDataStoreWithEmptyMemoryStore in class KnowledgeBase
        Parameters:
        storeIdToOverride - the store to override with an empty memory triple store
        Returns:
        the new knowledge base, with the store overridden (this method does not modify the existing knowledge base)

      • overrideDataStoreWithStoreFromKnowledgeBase

        public ConcurrentKnowledgeBase overrideDataStoreWithStoreFromKnowledgeBase(String storeIdToOverride,
                                                                           KnowledgeBase other)
        Description copied from class: KnowledgeBase
        Create a new KnowledgeBase from this one. This call overrides the given store by the one found in other. This allows to transfer a triple store from one knowledge base to another
        Overrides:
        overrideDataStoreWithStoreFromKnowledgeBase in class KnowledgeBase
        Parameters:
        storeIdToOverride - the store to override with the corresponding store from other knowledge base
        other - the other knowledge base from which to transfer (copy or share depending on the store type) the store
        Returns:
        the new knowledge base, with the store overridden (this method does not modify the existing knowledge base)

      • runConcurrentQuery

        public <T> Future<T> runConcurrentQuery(Callable<T> callable)
        Run a concurrent query represented by runnable object.
        Parameters:
        callable - a closure representing the query.
        Returns:
        A future whose value will be computed asynchronosly.

      • runConcurrentQuery

        public <T> Future<T> runConcurrentQuery(CallableWithKB<T> callable)
        Run a concurrent query using a forked knowledge base.
        Parameters:
        callable - a closure representing the query.
        Returns:
        A future whose value will be computed asynchronosly. This method executes with a forked knowledge base and is more suitable for longer tasks that do not benifit from sharing memoed data with this knowledge base.

        setRdfDataStore in class KnowledgeBase
        Returns:
